Containers.Name: Ubuntu Playground
Containers.Overview: Ubuntu Playground (NO GUI) is a place where you can play with ubuntu command NOTE The data of the containter will be clear if you force update the container Click on the container icon then click console to access it
Containers.Description: Ubuntu Playground (NO GUI) is a place where you can play with ubuntu command NOTE The data of the containter will be clear if you force update the container Click on the container icon then click console to access it

Config.Name: Home Directory
Config.Description: This is where playground will store you user's home directory

Config.Name: APT Packages
Config.Description: The List of aptitude packages you wish to install (Seperated by space)

Containers.DonateText: If you like it, then consider buying me a soda as I don't like beer :P
